fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Culture, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Digital economy and society, Communication
head_office_address: Calle Príncipe de Vergara, 74. Planta. 2ª. (Edificio CEOE)
eu_initiatives: Media Publishing, Copyright Directive, Audiovisual Media Services Directive, VAT on e-publications, Journalism, Freedom of Speech, Freedom of enterprise
organisation_name: Asociación Española de Editoriales de Publicaciones Periódicas (AEEPP)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: AEEPP represents hundreds of publishing companies from Spain that publish more than 1000 titles across a wide range of sectors, periodicities (daily, weekly, biweekly, monthly, yearbooks ) and channels (print, digital, free and paid) with together run over 500 million copies a year, reach an estimated 15 million readers a month in print and over three million unique visitors a day ‘on line’. AEEPP publishers employ 2,400 professionals, mostly journalists. (http://www.aeepp.com)
legal_status: Asociación empresarial sin animo de lucro
